item.title: Edit Passport Photo Size Specs - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Md. J., I'm uploading an ID photo for an application and these are the specs required for it. Can you please help me edit the photo to fix the required specs. The file must be in JPG or JPEG as well. I'd like to have this done as quickly as possible to get this application submitted. The color of the photo doesn't need to fixed or edited, only the sizing and etc.

- no more than 6 months old
- 40–35mm in width
- close up of your head and top of your shoulders so that your face takes up %80–70 of the photograph

- have appropriate brightness and contrast
- be printed on high quality paper, and at high resolution


Posted On: July 01, 2024 07:10 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Photo Editing, Logo Design, Product Design, Thumbnail, YouTube Thumbnail, Photo Retouching, Photo Restoration, Adobe Photoshop, Image Enhancement, Adobe Premiere Pro, Image Editing, Photo Manipulation, Background Removal, Social Media Imagery
Skills: Video Editing, Photo Editing, Logo Design, Product Design, Thumbnail, YouTube Thumbnail, Photo Retouching, Photo Restoration, Adobe Photoshop, Image Enhancement, Adobe Premiere Pro, Image Editing, Photo Manipulation, Background Removal, Social Media Imagery
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Account Manager - Upwork
item.description:
The challenge we present to you is creating engaging shorts based on income percentile data for each state. 💲🇺🇸

We are targeting 3 posts throughout the day every day which we expect to take less than 1 hour a day to prepare.

The trail contract will last 2 weeks and we are hoping to hire after for larger projects! The aim for the two weeks is 3 posts a day for a total of 42 posts throughout the 2 weeks. That may sound like a lot but each post should take no longer than 5-10 minutes to prepare.

Please review the onboarding instructions in the following link for a detailed overview of the task: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1A9Uq2QEMXjZLZnYCU9_NOIqtVZyGd0dBOofqJX_Igpo/edit?usp=sharing

Budget: $18

item.title: Editing down individual presentations from a longer recording into their own video files - Upwork
item.description:
I have a simple video editing job that involves a recording of up to 3 hours long. The recording contains various presentations and panel discussions, of which I can provide a schedule. Due to the live nature of the event, some speakers did not stick to their exact timing, but you can use this as a guide.

I simply need you to cut the video into separate files, so that I can upload each individual presentation to my website.

Please note, there are some areas where there will be a missing presenter or only audio. For this you can ask me what needs to be done on a case by case basis.

In attachment, you will find an example of a workshop.

Budget: $10
Posted On: July 01, 2024 07:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Event Highlights Video, Video Editing, English
Skills: Event Highlights Video, Video Editing, English
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Posts Designer - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a creative genius passionate about designing engaging and visually appealing social media content? Do you have an eye for detail and a knack for creating posts that capture attention and drive engagement? If so, we want you to join our team at Core42 Labs!

Position: Social Media Post Designer

About Us:
Core42 Labs is a dynamic and innovative software company dedicated to delivering end-to-end solutions for our clients. Our mission is to create a lasting legacy by providing top-notch design, development, and deployment services. We are looking for a skilled Social Media Post Designer to enhance our online presence and help us connect with our audience in meaningful ways.

Responsibilities:
Create visually stunning and engaging social media posts for platforms like Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Twitter.
Develop and execute creative concepts that align with our brand identity and marketing strategy.
Collaborate with our marketing and content teams to produce cohesive and compelling social media campaigns.
Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends and social media best practices.
Edit and optimize images and graphics for various social media platforms.
Ensure all designs are consistent with our brand guidelines and tone.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a Social Media Post Designer or similar role.
Strong portfolio showcasing your social media design work.
Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva, or similar software.
Excellent understanding of social media platforms and their design requirements.
Creative thinking and the ability to generate unique and engaging content ideas.
Strong attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines.
Good communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with a remote team.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience working with tech or software companies.
Knowledge of video editing tools and creating short video content for social media.
Familiarity with social media analytics and the ability to track and measure the success of your designs.

What We Offer:
Competitive compensation based on experience and portfolio.
Flexible working hours and the opportunity to work remotely.
A supportive and collaborative team environment.
The chance to be part of an exciting and rapidly growing company.

How to Apply:
If you are passionate about social media design and want to make a significant impact at Core42 Labs, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you fit this role perfectly.

Apply now and help us elevate our social media presence to new heights!

Budget: $50
Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:53 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Graphic Design, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Content, Social Media Imagery
Skills: Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Graphic Design, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Content, Social Media Imagery
Country: Pakistan
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative and skilled TikTok Content Creator to join our marketing team. Our brand has a deep  loyal following on Instagram and we are looking to reach a fresh audience through this new and exciting social media platform. As a TikTok Content Creator, you will be responsible for developing engaging and viral TikTok videos that align with our brand identity and target audience.

Your main goal will be to increase brand awareness and drive user engagement through educational and entertaining content. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of TikTok trends and have a deep knowledge of health and wellness to support the educational aspect of our brand values. You will join our team of marketing experts and collaborate to test a range of organic content and work through an iterative process to improve engagement and build the following of the brand on this social media channel.

If you have a passion for social media and can create captivating TikTok videos that represent brands authentically, we would love to hear from you!

Skills:
- Proficiency in using TikTok's editing features
- Ability to create unique and entertaining content
- Strong understanding of TikTok trends
- Excellent storytelling and video editing skills
- Good knowledge of social media marketing
- Ability to work collaboratively in a team
- Awareness of methods to identify viral content

Hourly Range: $9.00-$28.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:47 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, Marketing, Content Writing
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, Marketing, Content Writing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Virtual Assistant on Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
Brief for VA Social Media Content Creation

Objective:

To consistently post engaging and relevant vertical videos and static posts twice daily on LinkedIn, covering topics such as motivation, business, marketing, consumer behavior, leadership, and inspiring quotes.

Responsibilities:
1. Content Extraction: Continuously source new videos and quotes related to the specified topics.
2. Content Editing: Edit videos to integrate branding elements and ensure high quality.
3. Copywriting: Write engaging and relevant copy for each video and graphic.
4. Credits: Include proper credits at the bottom of each post.
5. Content Management: Upload edited content to a Google Drive folder and update a Google Sheet with the LinkedIn copy for approval.

Step-by-Step Process:

1. Content Sourcing
Videos: Search for relevant motivational, business, marketing, consumer behavior, and leadership videos.
Quotes: Find inspiring quotes related to the same topics from credible sources.
2. Content Editing
Videos:
Trim and edit videos to fit vertical format (9:16 aspect ratio).
Integrate branding elements (e.g., logo, color scheme, tagline).
Add subtitles if necessary.

Graphics:
 Design static posts using sourced quotes and relevant imagery.
 Ensure consistency with branding elements.

3. Copywriting
Write a compelling and relevant caption for each video and graphic.
Make sure the copy aligns with the theme of the content and engages the target audience.
Include hashtags and any relevant tags to increase visibility.
Always include credits at the bottom of the post.

4. Credits
Properly attribute the source of the video or quote.
Add credits in a clear and professional manner at the bottom of each post.

5. Content Management
Upload the final edited video or graphic to the designated Google Drive folder.
Update the corresponding Google Sheet with:
 Title of the content
 Date of upload
 LinkedIn copy for approval
 Status (e.g., pending approval, approved, posted)
Ensure that each content item in the Google Drive is linked to its entry in the Google Sheet.

6. Approval Process
Notify the approver once the Google Sheet is updated.
Make any necessary revisions based on feedback.

Tools and Resources
Video Editing Software: Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or any preferred editing software.
Graphic Design Tools: Canva, Adobe Photoshop, or similar.
Google Drive: For storing and sharing edited content.
Google Sheets: For managing content and approval workflow.

Quality Assurance:
Ensure all content is high quality and free of errors.
Double-check that all credits are accurate and properly included.
Verify that the content aligns with the brand's voice and messaging.

PLEASE SEND ME SOME PAST EXAMPLES OR WHEN NOT YET EXPERIENCED PLEASE TRY A FREE ROUND TO SHOW THE CAPABILITIES



Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:43 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Content Creation
Skills: Content Creation
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.title: Video creator for Corporate Internal video - Upwork
item.description:
DCP is an international Construction Chemicals company with operations in over 10 countries. We are seeking a talented Video Creator to produce an engaging company introduction video for internal use only. This video will help new employees understand our history, culture, values, global operations, and key people within the company.

Job description:
• Develop a storyboard and plan the video’s structure.
• Comply with our brand guidelines
• Showcase DCP’s timeline of company history and a map of locations , culture, values, portfolio and products, key people.
• Edit and finalize the video to ensure a cohesive and engaging narrative.

Requirements:
• Proven experience in video creation and editing.
• Strong portfolio with relevant work.
• Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
• Excellent storytelling and organizational skills.
• Ability to maintain brand consistency.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with corporate videos.
• Knowledge of motion graphics and animation tools (e.g., After Effects).

Please share your relevant experience and portfolio when applying for the job.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:42 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:M4V, AVI, Corporate Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Explainer Video
Skills: M4V, AVI, Corporate Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Explainer Video
Country: United Arab Emirates

item.title: Easy 30 second video - Upwork
item.description:
Project Objective:
Create a concise, visually engaging 30-second promotional video that effectively demonstrates the transformative features of the Modelia platform and highlights its benefits for users.

Video Structure and Content Instructions:
Section 1: Transformation Showcase
Format: Each transformation is introduced with a title, followed by a source image and its transformed target image.
Execution: Use smooth transitions between images to enhance viewer understanding. Display titles where the key attribute being changed is in gradient for emphasis.
Example Sequence:
Title: "Change the Gender" ("Gender" in gradient, like in our HERO)
Source Image: Man in a hoodie
Target Image: Woman in the same hoodie

Continue with similar pairs for "Age," "Ethnicity," "Facial Expression," "Background," and "Back of the Garment."

Visuals: We will provide all 12 visuals (2 for each section)

Section 2: Highlighting Key Concepts
Presentation: Use rapid succession of text slides with dynamic effects to maintain engagement.
Text Slides:
"From Flatlay to Full Model" ("Full Model" in gradient)
"Generate Any Model" ("Model" in gradient)
"Your Images, Hyperpersonalized" ("Hyperpersonalized" in gradient)
Style: Each key concept should pop on the screen with engaging animations or effects to draw attention, using a clean and modern font that aligns with the Modelia brand.

Section 3: Summary Message
Content: Display the summary message, "Turn your images into inspirational images" with "inspirational images" in gradient to emphasize the transformative impact of the service.
Visuals: This should be a clear, impactful statement with a slightly longer screen time to allow for absorption.

Section 4: Logo Reveal
Execution: Conclude with a clean and prominent display of the Modelia logo, signaling the end of the video. Consider a creative animation that transitions from the summary message to the logo for a smooth flow.

Technical and Style Notes:
Resolution: Aim for 1080p or higher to ensure quality.
Aesthetic: Maintain a sleek, professional look throughout the video to reflect the advanced technology of Modelia.
Transitions: Use smooth, professional transitions that add to the storytelling without overpowering the content.
Colors: Use the "pink to purple" gradient that can be found in our website.

Deliverables:
The final video in MP4 format.
All raw files and assets used, provided in a well-organized compressed folder.

Hourly Range: $17.00-$44.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:27 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Edit & Produce Youtube Videos & Podcast - Native English Speakers ONLY - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone who can help me to create weekly youtube videos and podcasts for my new podcast "The Australian Holiday Rental Show" (vacation rentals).

I will be recording a 10-15 minute Youtube / podcast weekly and need help with:

- Editing video for youtube - adding title screen, screenshots, bullet points, etc to video
- Adding metadata to youtube, podcasts, etc
- Editing audio for podcast and uploading to buzzsprout
- advising on best practices for making the videos / podcasts successful
- Other tasks required to get them online quickly and effectively

Hourly Range: $8.00-$40.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:21 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Podcast, Podcast Editing, YouTube
Skills: Podcast, Podcast Editing, YouTube
Country: Australia
click to apply
